Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that has plenty of water and light, showing it healthy and growing.
The student can draw a plant that is without water, showing it wilting or not growing well.
The student can draw a plant that is without light, showing it not growing well or not healthy.
The student can illustrate patterns by showing multiple plants with different combinations of water and light.
The student can use drawings to show that plants need both water and light to thrive.
